overview_of_class: Students master fundamental broadcast techniques, learning professional shooting and video editing techniques for news. Class trains students to operate field video and audio equipment and studio edit systems similar to those found in television production facilities. Students learn how to write and produce short newscasts, master production terminology and use proper production values in their content.
name: Video Journalism
title: JOUR JOUR 433-0-20 Video Journalism
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Only students in the MSJ program may enroll in these classes
